name: gymconnect-server
description: Servidor local para desenvolvimento do GymConnect

scripts.dev:sequential: npm run dev & timeout /t 5 & npm run client
scripts.dev:wait: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3001/api/test && npm run client"
scripts.build:full: npm run build && npm run start:production
scripts.netlify:deploy: cd client && npm run build && netlify deploy --prod --dir=build --functions=../netlify/functions

author: GymConnect Team
